mapper.select: SELECT a.USR_ID , a.POLICY_ID , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') AS POLICY_NM , COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE 1=1 AND POLICY_NM like '%${PLCYNM}%' AND USR_ID like '%${USRID}%' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID

SELECT a.USR_ID , a.POLICY_ID , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') AS POLICY_NM , a.POLICY_HIT_DT , a.LOGIN_IP , a.LOGIN_IP_CNTR FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID WHERE 1=1 AND a.POLICY_ID = '${PLCYID}' AND a.USR_ID = '${USRID}'

SELECT a.USR_ID , a.POLICY_ID , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') AS POLICY_NM , COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE a.USR_ID = '${USRID}' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID
SELECT PASSWORD , USR_ID FROM COMTNUSERMNG WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNBLKIPMNGR WHERE BLK_IP LIKE '${LGINIP}%' AND BLK_IP_TYP = '01'
SELECT BLK_IP , BLK_IP_CIDR FROM COMTNBLKIPMNGR WHERE BLK_IP_TYP = '02'
SELECT COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}' AND POLICY_ID = '${PLCYID}'

SELECT POLICY_ID , POLICY_NM , POLICY_DC , POLICY_BGNDT , POLICY_ENDDT , POLICY_APPY_YN , POLICY_REGIST_DT , POLICY_REGIST_DT , POLICY_HTMXCNT , POLICY_APPY_USRID FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICY WHERE POLICY_APPY_YN = 'Y' AND '${PDT}' BETWEEN POLICY_BGNDT AND POLICY_ENDDT

SELECT a.USR_ID , a.POLICY_ID , ifnull(b.POLICY_NM,'-미등록정책-') AS POLICY_NM , COUNT(*) CNT FROM COMTNLOGINPOLICYHITHISTORY a LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNLOGINPOLICY b ON (a.POLICY_ID = b.POLICY_ID) WHERE a.USR_ID = '${USRID}' GROUP BY a.USR_ID, a.POLICY_ID

SELECT ESNTL_ID as "uniqId", 'USR01' as "userTy", USR_ID as "userId", USR_NM as "userNm", USR_EMAIL_ADRES as "emailAdres", AREA_NO as "areaNo", MIDDLE_TELNO as "middleTelno", END_TELNO as "endTelno", MBTLNUM as "moblphonNo", -- GROUP_ID as "groupId", USR_STTUS as "sttus", SBSCRB_DE as "sbscrbDe" FROM COMTNUSERMNG WHERE USR_ID = '${USRID}'
